message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. Let me know if that sounds good to you!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking to meet in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go that low. How about we meet at $120? I think it's a fair price for this amazing product
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110? I really like the product and would like to make a deal
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $125. I think that's the lowest I can go and still make a profit. Let me know if that works for you
